author: cnbc.com
title: ForeScout: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif. (AP) _ ForeScout Technologies Inc. (FSCT) on Thursday reported a loss of $28.2 million in its first quarter.
The San Jose, California-based company said it had a loss of 74 cents per share. Losses, adjusted for stock option expense, were 38 cents per share.
The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for a loss of 45 cents per share.
The cybersecurity company posted revenue of $59.7 million in the period.
For the current quarter ending in July, ForeScout expects its results to range from a loss of 39 cents per share to a loss of 37 cents per share.
The company said it expects revenue in the range of $61 million to $64 million for the fiscal second quarter.
ForeScout expects full-year results to range from a loss of $1.08 per share to a loss of $1 per share, with revenue ranging from $270.4 million to $280.4 million.
ForeScout shares have declined 5 percent since the beginning of the year.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on FSCT at https://www.zacks.com/ap/FSCT
